name: Cloud Giant Noble
description: The Cloud Giant Noble is a Huge Giant characterized by its towering stature, exceptional strength, and impressive magical capabilities. It possesses a glaive and can manipulate weather effectively.
memorable: Combines immense physical prowess with powerful spellcasting, control over the battlefield, and a charming presence.
goals: To dominate adversaries using both brute strength and clever magic, maintaining control over the environment.
relations: Often found among other giants or in the company of powerful spellcasters.
environment: Clouds and elevated terrains, thriving where it can use its spellcasting effectively.
strengths: Exceptional physical strength, innate spellcasting abilities, and tactical crowd control options.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks and ranged strategies, less effective against quick mobile opponents.
attacks: Utilizes a glaive for powerful melee strikes and can throw heavy rocks at range, both capable of knocking opponents prone.
most_powerful_ability: Reverse Gravity, allowing it to hurl enemies into the air, dealing damage on impact.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 17, allowing it to detect hidden threats easily.
skills: Has proficiency in Insight, Perception, and Persuasion, showcasing its ability to read and influence others.
additional_information: Benefits from resistances to lightning and thunder damage.
Can see through clouds and fog without impairment.
Has several powerful spell-like abilities including Arc Lightning and Blinking Blades.
Has a high Strength modifier, significantly enhancing its melee capabilities.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting ability allowing it to manipulate the battlefield with spells like fog cloud and control weather.
test_queries: giant that can charm and fly
